problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ACB中,∠ACB=90°,∠A=35°,将△ABC绕点C逆时针旋转α角到△A1B1C的位置,A1B1恰好经过点B,则旋转角α的度数等()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ACB, ∠ACB = N_0, ∠A = N_1, rotate △ABC counterclockwise around point C by an angle α to the position of △A1B1C, A1B1just passes through point B, then the rotation angle α is Degree is equal to()
raw_answer: 解:∵在Rt△ACB中,∠ACB=90°,∠A=35°,∴∠ABC=55°,.将△ABC绕点C逆时针旋转α角到∠A′B′C的位置,∴∠B′=∠ABC=55^{°},∠B′CA′}=∠ACB=90^{°},CB=CB′,∴∠CBB′=∠B′=55°,∴∠α=70°,故选:A.
raw_comment: 本题考查旋转的性质以及等腰三角形的性质.注意掌握旋转前后图形的对应关系是解此题的关键.
